title: The Royal Treatment
short_cast: Laura Marano, Mena Massoud, Chelsie Preston Crayford, Grace Bentley-Tsibuah, Cameron Rhodes, Sonia Gray, Elizabeth Hawthorne, Amanda Billing, James Gaylyn, Paul Norell, Teuila Blakely, Jacque Drew, Phoenix Connolly, Matthew E. Morgan, Jay Simon
